table.title: Table (Data Table)
table.description: Header: Orbitron 11px uppercase sticky. Striped rows. Hover: yellow tint.

list.title: List & List Item
list.description: Diamond bullet ◆ #FFD429. Numbered: Orbitron, counter leading-zero.

stats.title: Stat & Metric Display
stats.description: Value: Orbitron 48px bold yellow. Label: Orbitron 11px uppercase gray. Trend: ▲/▼.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: Vertical line 1px. Node: ◆ current yellow, ◇ past gray. Date: Orbitron 11px.

accordion.title: Accordion / Collapsible
accordion.description: Indicator: +/− in yellow (JetBrains Mono). NOT chevron. Content slides down.
accordion.answer_placeholder: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

avatar.title: Avatar & Profile
avatar.description: Shape: Square with clipped corner (clip-path) — NOT circle. Status: diamond shape.

tags.title: Tags, Badges & Labels
tags.description: Tag font: Orbitron 10px, uppercase. Diamond-shaped badges. Semantic colors.

progress.title: Progress & Stepper
progress.description: Progress bar: 4px track. Stepper: Diamond nodes, connector lines.
